name: Custom Tie-Dye Collars
description:
BECAUSE OUR COLLARS ARE HANDMADE, WE HAVE THE ABILITY TO CREATE SPECIAL SIZED AND UNIQUE CUSTOM DESIGNS

EXPRESS YOURSELF. So you want that something special for your special someone? This is the place to let us know all about your ideas. Crazy or not we'll do our best to help you out. We take pride in the handcrafted nature of our products and work hard producing the best quality we can with what we know. Good stuff takes time though, so please understand when placing a custom order that it will take more time to dye and put together your idea than something off the shelf. And while we will not tarry, we also will not compromise the integrity of the design while creating your vision. So it's only fair to say... it takes as long as it takes. 

please add $5 per collar & 3 weeks per order
* note that custom orders are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.

name: Hemp Rope Lead/Leash - 5'ft long
description:
MADE TO STAND THE TEST OF TIME  THIS ALL NATURAL ROPE IS THE CLOSEST THING TO ROPE USED HISTORICALLY DURING COLONIAL TIMES.

5'FT HEMP ROPE LEAD/LEASH â€¢ STRONG & LIGHT WEIGHT

Hemp rope is naturally resistant to salt & ultra violet rays. Each leash is hand spliced & carefully constructed using heavy duty hardware.    

SMALL size is 8mm thick & wonderful for small breeds or puppies.
MEDIUM size is 10mm thick & great for  dogs under 35lbs
LARGE can be for strong dogs or just big ones over 35lbs

ALL LEASH/LEADS ARE 5'FT LONG

name: Medium QR Reflective Orange Tie-Dye
description:
* med size-14"-18"
* orange reflective hand tie-dyed
* made from 100% hemp canvas with heavy duty metal hardware and 3M   bright reflective trim

name: Large QR Hemp Collar
description:
Large QR Hemp Collar

name: Custom Solid Hemp Collars
description:
QUICK RELEASE, CLASSIC BUCKLE & MARTINGALE COLLARS ARE ALL MADE BY HAND WITH 100% HEMP CANVAS AND HEAVY DUTY METAL HARDWARE.

Simple Beauty... Dog Collars That Are Strong & Comfy.

Hemp is naturally hypoallergenic, comfortable and naturally resistant to mold and ultraviolet light. Softening with wear, hemp collars are also machine washable making them a prefect choice for both you and your dogs.

please add $5 per collar & 2 weeks per custom order
* note that custom orders are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.
